name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience developing high-performance applications in diverse industries, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Python** and experienced in **Go**, with a strong focus on building robust, scalable solutions. Expertise in leveraging **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, ensuring efficient management of APIs and system resources through **APIServer**, controllers, and persistent volumes. Skilled in deploying adaptable systems with **Cluster Autoscaler** and **Karpenter** for resource optimization.

Experienced in full-stack development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, and backend frameworks like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Committed to implementing compliance-driven engineering practices in alignment with HIPAA and PCI DSS standards. Strong foundation in AI/ML with MLOps experience, utilizing tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow for orchestration and predictive analytics. Dedicated to continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to enhance software delivery efficiency.
